title: 7.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
a. Add a few more fields in the Excel file from challenge 1, as shown below

b. Fill the Gender and Date of birth. Use DATE, MONTH, and YEAR functions to extract Date, Month and Year from the field Date of birth as shown below.

c. Use the LEFT function to extract the first three letters of the First name. Merge the first three letters of the First name and the year of birth to form a code using the TEXTJOIN function as shown below.
